## Singularity.getCharityStats() method

Get stats related to a charity.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  charity | [CharityType](./bitburner.charitytype.md) \| \`${[CharityType](./bitburner.charitytype.md)<!-- -->}\` | Name of charity. |

**Returns:**

[CharityStats](./bitburner.charitystats.md)

The stats of the charity.
